alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Fayette; Greene; Madison; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 8:22AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF FAYETTE, CLINTON, NORTHWESTERN PICKAWAY, SOUTHEASTERN GREENE AND SOUTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 845 AM EDT... At 822 AM EDT, showers were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of London to near Blanchester, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Wilmington, Blanchester, Sabina, Mount Sterling, New Vienna, Jeffersonville, Bloomingburg, New Holland, Staunton, Commercial Point, Good Hope, Martinsville, Midway, Midland, Orient, Darbyville, Milledgeville, Octa and Melvin. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 57 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
